channel.title: Prevent logout before 10 seconds
channel.description:
Could someone point me in the right direction in putting into the client and/or server a log out prevention measure that prevents players from logging out for 10 seconds if they have walked or cast a spell previously in that amount of time?
I have been trying in both the client's mudclient.java and the server's player.java without any success.

item.title: Prevent logout before 10 seconds
item.dc:creator: @froggie froggie
item.description:
@froggie wrote:

I also came up with the idea of setting the timer for the combat from 10 seconds that the player must wait and moving it to something more like 30 seconds so they must wait that long after combat before they may log out.

Read full topic

item.title: Prevent logout before 10 seconds
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

its not from the client site you can remove the timer or set it to 1 sec.
look in the player.java

Read full topic
